title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, October 2, 2021
description: The comic "Peanuts" by Charles M. Schulz, which brought the world the iconic characters of Charlie Brown, Snoopy, and Lucy, was first published on this day in 1950.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
